info.name: Ouptel Admin API v1
info.description: API collection for login, ping, albums (list, create).

request.description: Login with username+password or email+password.
List paginated albums. per_page (1..50). Uses Authorization: Bearer {{token}} from login.
Creates a new album post for the logged-in user (from token). Images are stored in Wo_Albums_Media.

request.description: Create a simple text post. Privacy: 0=Public, 1=Friends, 2=Only Me, 3=Custom, 4=Group

Create a video post with YouTube link. Also supports Vimeo, Dailymotion, Facebook, Vine, SoundCloud, Playtube, Deepsound
